content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Line at (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner mining drill at (-15.0, -50.0) facing down, mining iron ore
- Burner inserter at (-14.5, -48.5) transferring ore from drill to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-14.0, -47.0) smelting iron ore into plates
- All machines fueled with coal
- Currently waiting for ore transfer to begin (drill output blocked, inserter waiting for items)

### Unused Furnaces
Two stone furnaces were previously placed and cleaned up/removed from the map.

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too close together
- When placing inserters next to other entities, ensure proper spacing and check for existing entities at the target position
- Use appropriate spacing parameters when using place_entity_next_to() to avoid collisions

### Errors when machines lack required resources
- Ensure coal/fuel is available in inventory before attempting to insert into machines
- Check inventory contents before attempting resource insertions

### Errors when crafting items requiring machine processing
- Items like iron plates cannot be crafted directly and require smelting in a furnace
- Ensure proper production chain is set up before attempting to craft items requiring processed materials

### Type errors when working with entity dimensions
- Do not try to directly add ModelPrivateAttr values
- Access the actual dimension values before performing arithmetic operations
